location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Lieutenant Colonel Andrew Aitchison, Military General, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: There is a small amount of insect damage at the bottom edge of the folio. The legibility of the text has not been affected.

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, enquires about the correct allowances for commissioned and non-commissioned officers.
